title: Interview: Alt-J's Gus Unger-Hamilton on "The Dream," and rooting for Liverpool
description:
Ahead of the release of @altj's 2022 record "The Dream," Gus Unger-Hamilton caught up with The Current's Mac Wilson about writing in a pandemic, which football teams the band is rooting for, and the themes they explore on the record.

title: Interview: Low Cut Connie's Adam Weiner is staying positive
description:
Ahead of Low Cut Connie's performance at The Current's 17th anniversary party, Jill Riley talks to Adam Weiner about staying positive when he's on stage, and why live performances are such an important part of his life.

title: Lianne La Havas - three solo performances for The Current (2020)
description:
In 2020, Lianne La Havas recorded three solo performances at her home in London exclusively for The Current. Two of the songs are from Lianne La Havas's 2020 self-titled release; the third song is from 2015's "Blood."

SONGS PERFORMED
00:00 "Courage"
3:43 "Bittersweet"
8:36 "Green & Gold"

FIND MORE:
2012 studio session: https://www.thecurrent.org/feature/2012/11/12/lianne-la-havas-in-studio

title: Listen to Looch: 'Nuclear Family' explores the meaning of family through filmmaker's own story
description:
This week, Mary Lucia discusses the three-part documentary series, "Nuclear Family," streaming now on HBO Max.

In "Nuclear Family," filmmaker Ry Russo-Young turns the camera on her own family to explore the meaning and dynamics of family. Ry and her sister Cade were born to two lesbian mothers through sperm donors. In 1991, one of the donors brought a lawsuit for paternity and visitation rights. "[The film] goes through the the back-and-forth of the of the litigation and what that did to the nuclear family, hence the name," Mary says.

In sharing her story, Ry Russo-Young tells a larger story about how the way LGBTQ families are perceived was changed, and about how families come in many different forms. Watch more of what Mary has to say in the video above.

See more from Listen to Looch:
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYClJc3TpV5J_sXyCfes-p6vCgOpCmleh
